comments.raw_text:
We use the term "Join Mozilla" to mean a few things.  It currently is used:

* To become an employee of the Mozilla Foundation
* To become a community member of the Mozilla Foundation
* To come to a Mozilla-sponsored event

When I visit the landing page for Join Mozilla ( https://donate.mozilla.org/page/contribute/protect-the-web ) it takes me a while to determine whether this page is asking me to become an employee or a contributor.  It's not apparent in the above the fold text.  It's only covered in the "Share the Love, Show the Love" section.

I'd like to see Mozilla differentiate the language chosen for becoming an employee versus becoming a contributor, so that we can make these campaigns readily obvious in the Title and Elevator pitch for campaigns like this.
comments.creator: ryansnyder.me+bugs@gmail.com
